Projects

close

Instdio Communications

Instdio is a Toronto-based corporate communications consultancy.

Deliverables: brand identity, brand guidelines, physical, digital and website assets, a secondary design element library and a digital business discovery deck product.

close

Dinowash

Dinowash is a car-wash service platform application.

Deliverables: new logo, word mark and brand identity, physical and digital marketing materials, WordPress site redesign, uniform applications and a proof-of-concept video feature to attract investor funding.

close

Explor VR

Explor VR is irtual reality platform for the travel industry.

Deliverables: brand identity, brand guidelines, packaging, physical and digital marketing materials, trade-show materials, business plan and white paper for prospective clients.

close

Dark Tapes

Dark Tapes is an electronic musician.

Deliverables: 12”-single vinyl album cover design and layout, t-shirt design, promotional Instagram visualizer.

close

Nick Martinello, Comedian

Nick is a Halifax-based stand-up comic.

Deliverables: Visual identity and language guide, business cared and website, promotional posters.

The Game was a monthly show and podcast based out of Toronto’s Comedy Bar.

Deliverables: Logo, Apple Podcasts icon and marketing materials.

close

Travelweek

Travelweek is a Canadian travel trade news organization.

Deliverables: weekly 24-48 page print magazine, digital edition, marketing materials, and advertising for clients. 2019 saw the magazine refreshed with new layouts, design elements and typography.

The Japan/Tokyo 2018 is an informative guide for travel agents to familiarize themselves with Japan and Tokyo. Project clients were Go Tokyo the Japan Tourism Agency.
